title: CLI-Native Agent Orchestration

problem.en: Web chat UIs are awkward for repeat runs, local file edits, or scripting inside CI pipelines.
problem.ko: 웹 채팅 UI는 반복 실행, 로컬 파일 편집, CI 파이프라인 내 스크립팅에 어색합니다.

solution.en: Expose agent capabilities through a first-class CLI: spec run for code generation, spec test for validation, repl for interactive sessions. Integrate in Makefiles, Git hooks, or cron jobs.
solution.ko: 일급 CLI를 통해 에이전트 기능 노출: 코드 생성용 spec run, 검증용 spec test, 대화형 세션용 repl. Makefile, Git 훅, cron 작업에 통합.

mermaid_diagram:
flowchart TD
    A[Development Workflow] --> B[Makefile]
    A --> C[Git Hooks]
    A --> D[Cron Jobs]
    B --> E[claude spec run]
    C --> F[claude spec test]
    D --> G[claude repl]
    E --> H[Generated Code]
    F --> I[Test Results]
    G --> J[Interactive Session]
code_example:
# Makefile integration
generate-from-spec:
	claude spec run --input api.yaml --output src/

test-spec-compliance:
	claude spec test --spec api.yaml --codebase src/

# Git pre-commit hook
#!/bin/bash
claude spec test || exit 1

# Headless automation
claude -p "summarize changes" --output-format json

en: Easy to embed in other tools
